doc.field: NO ONE COULD EVER SAY THAT ELIZABETH FALKNER plays it safe. She opened Citizen Cake as a South of Market bakery, then...
Dazzling works of confectionary art are the centerpieces of this airy, loftlike Hayes Valley bakery-cum-restaurant...
Citizen Cake offers a solution. With exceptional food in a hip, come-as-you-are dining room, the restaurant can suit...
California entrees and appetizers take a back seat to dessert at this minimalist Hayes Valley restaurant.
Ladies who lunch, pre-theater diners and those in search of a late-night dessert flock to this industrial-styled...
